name: odh-landscape
description: Interactive visualization of a technology landscape

scripts.build:full: npm run latest; npm config set scripts-prepend-node-path true; export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; npm explore interactive-landscape -- npm run build; cp nginx.conf dist
scripts.prebuild: npm config set scripts-prepend-node-path true; export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; npm explore interactive-landscape -- npm run prebuild
scripts.quick-build: npm config set scripts-prepend-node-path true; export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; npm explore interactive-landscape -- npm run quick-build
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run quick-build

author: cchase
